method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the PhoneStateListener. EventName - Events subs prefix.

method.name: objSignalStrength
method.comment: Returns the SignalStrength. SignalStrength has a value when onSignalStrengthsChanged is called. You can work with this object in the Reflector library. Return type: @return:

method.name: startListeningForEvent
method.comment: Starts listening for specific event in the phone. See the LISTEN_Attributes

method.name: startListening
method.comment: Starts listening for all PhoneStateListener Events. Use startListeningForEvent for specific events.

method.name: stopListeningForEvent
method.comment: Stops listening for PhoneStateListener Events called from StartListeningForEvent.

method.name: objServiceState
method.comment: Returns the ServiceState. ServiceState1 has a value when onServiceStateChanged is called. You can work with this object in the Reflector library. Return type: @return:

method.name: stopListening
method.comment: Stops listening for all PhoneStateListener Events. Use stopListeningForEvent to stop specific events.

method.name: objCellLocation
method.comment: Returns the CellLocation. CellLocation has a value when onCellLocationChanged is called. You can work with this object in the Reflector library. Return type: @return:

property.name: CellLocation
property.comment: Gets the cell location in a string.

property.name: EvdoSnr
property.comment: Get the signal to noise ratio.

property.name: CdmaDbm
property.comment: Get the CDMA RSSI value in dBm

property.name: GsmBitErrorRate
property.comment: Get the GSM bit error rate (0-7, 99) as defined in TS 27.007 8.5

property.name: CdmaEcio
property.comment: Get the CDMA Ec/Io value in dB*10

property.name: GsmSignalStrength
property.comment: Get the GSM Signal Strength, valid values are (0-31, 99) as defined in TS 27.007 8.5

property.name: EvdoDbm
property.comment: Get the EVDO RSSI value in dBm

property.name: EvdoEcio
property.comment: Get the EVDO Ec/Io value in dB*10
